entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:35 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 09:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
